strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.description: Ensure the pouring area is well-lit to reduce visual noise and enhance visibility.
strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.example: Install a task lamp to illuminate the pouring surface.

strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.description: Opt for clear containers to visually track the liquid level and flow.
strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.example: Use a transparent measuring cup for accurate liquid measurements.

strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.description: Use containers with visible measurement markings to reduce uncertainty.
strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.example: Pour milk into a measuring jug with graduated markings.

strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.description: Use non-slip mats or clamps to stabilize containers during pouring.
strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.example: Place a non-slip mat under the target container to prevent movement.

strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.description: Listen to the sound of the liquid filling the target to gauge progress.
strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.example: Stop pouring when the sound of liquid filling diminishes.

strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.description: Tilt the container slowly to maintain control and avoid splashing.
strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.example: Pour oil from a bottle by tilting it slightly at first, then increasing the angle.

strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.description: Employ a funnel or similar tool to guide the liquid into the target.
strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.example: Place a funnel in a narrow-neck bottle to ensure precision.

strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.description: Measure the required liquid amount beforehand to minimize over-pouring.
strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.example: Pre-fill a smaller container to pour into a tight space.

strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.description: Adjust grip strength and force based on container weight and liquid viscosity.
strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.example: Hold a heavy jug with both hands to control the tilt angle.

strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.description: Pause pouring to check the liquid level and adjust alignment if needed.
strategies_for_sensory_noise_or_uncertai.example: Stop pouring halfway to verify the target container is not overfilled.
